          <title>
            <string language="en">Underground water movement detection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterirdische Wasserbewegung Abfragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détection souterraine de mouvement de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deteção subterrânea do movimento da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rilevazione sotterranea del movimento dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπόγεια ανίχνευση μετακίνησης ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Detección subterránea del movimiento del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure illustrates how  to detect underground water movement using gamma emitting radiation source and a Geiger counter.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geiger counters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiation techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">underground water movement detection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung veranschaulicht, wie man 
unterirdische Wasserbewegung mit dem Gamma entdeckt, das Strahlung 
Quelle und einen Geigerzähler ausstrahlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure illustre comment détecter le mouvement
souterrain de l'eau en utilisant le gamma émettant la source de 
rayonnement et un compteur de Geiger.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura ilustra como detectar o movimento 
subterrâneo da água usando o gamma que emite-se a fonte da 
radiação e um contador de Geiger.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura illustra come rilevare il movimento 
sotterraneo dell'acqua usando il gamma che emette la sorgente di 
radiazione e un contatore di geiger.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός επεξηγεί πώς να ανιχνεύσει την υπόγεια 
μετακίνηση ύδατος χρησιμοποιώντας το γάμμα εκπέμποντας την πηγή 
ακτινοβολίας και έναν geiger μετρητή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura ilustra cómo detectar el movimiento 
subterráneo del agua usando la gamma que emite fuente de la 
radiación y un contador de geiger.</string>
          </description>
